sections.sectionType: Use only one of the following options: Header, Hero, Secondary Navigation Menu, Call to Action, Services, About Us, Testimonials, FAQs, Pricing, Contacts, Blog, Partners, Footer

background.type: Use only one of the following options: color, image

sectionContent.contentType: Use only one of the following options: single, slider

background.type: Use only one of the following options: color, image

sectionContent.width: value in percentage, skip this if the value is 100%
sectionContent.marginTop: value in px, skip this if the value is 0px
sectionContent.marginBottom: value in px, skip this if the value is 0px

grids.width: value in percentage, skip this if the value is 100%
grids.gridAlignment: Use only one of the following options: top, center, bottom
grids.marginTop: value in px, skip this if the value is 0px
grids.marginBottom: value in px, skip this if the value is 0px

columns.size: Number of columns, and the sum of their sizes cannot exceed 12

widgets.elementType: Use only one of the following options: text, search-box, login, cart, menu, image, button, form, social-links, box, logo, spacer, divider, accordion, otherwise skip it.
widgets.textType: Use only one of the following options: heading1, heading2, heading3, heading4, subheading, normal, link. it can be applied only if elementType is text, otherwise skip it.
widgets.charsCount: number of characters in the text. it can be applied only if elementType is text, otherwise skip it.
widgets.elementColor: color in HEX format. it can be applied only if elementType in search-box, login, cart.
items: For example, 'About Us', 'Projects', 'Contacts'. It is used for only menu type, otherwise skip it.
widgets.align: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right. It is used for only menu and social-links widget or if fitType is fit, otherwise skip it.
widgets.fitType: Use only one of the following options: fit, fill. It is used for only image and button types, otherwise skip it.
widgets.width: value in percentage, it can be applied only if fitType is fit. It is used for only image and button types, otherwise skip it, otherwise skip it.
widgets.color: color in HEX format. It is used for only image and divider types, otherwise skip it.
widgets.height: it can be from 20px to 300px. It is used for only image and spacer types, otherwise skip it.

borderRadius.$desc: It is used for only image, box types.

widgets.type: Use only one of the following options: vertical, horizontal. It is used for only form and box types, otherwise skip it.
widgets.buttonType: Use only one of the following options: primary, secondary. It is used for only button type, otherwise skip it.
widgets: It is used for only for box widget. Paste inner widgets here.

background.$desc: It is used for only box type.
background.type: Use only one of the following options: color, image

fontData.$desc: It is used for only text, menu, logo types.
fontData.textAlign: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right

widgets.itemsCount: number of items. It is used for only social-links, form and accordion types.

commonStyles.primaryButtonColor: color in HEX format. This is the color for all primary buttons
commonStyles.secondaryButtonColor: color in HEX format. This is the color for all secondary buttons

heading1Styles.textAlign: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right

heading2Styles.textAlign: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right

heading3Styles.textAlign: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right

heading4Styles.textAlign: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right

subheadingStyles.textAlign: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right

normalTextStyles.textAlign: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right
